Melissa and Mark at Shutter Shop were so easy to work with.  They came out quickly to measure and get me a competitive quote.  They explained all the various options for what kind of shutters I wanted.  They kept me updated as the … More Response from the owner 7 years ago It was so wonderful working with you. Keep in mind any referrals award you a check for 3% of their material purchase. Thanks again!

I ran into Mark coming out of a house across the street from ours and I called him over to measure our windows and provide a quote since we just moved in. Melissa and Mark came out with samples a few days later so we could see how each … More Response from the owner 6 years ago It was a pleasure to help you! Thank you for your very kind review.

A friend recommended that I reach out to Shutter Shop for the window treatments that I was in need of. I stopped in the showroom and met with Melissa, the designer. She was helpful with making recommendations while staying within my budget range.  I would highly recommend shutter shop to anyone needing window treatments. Response from the owner 6 years ago
